00051         bool coversPoint(uint64_t point) {
00052             if (rounds > 0)
00053                 return true;
00054             if (start < end) {
00055                 if ((point > start) && (point < end))
00056                     return true;
00057                 return false;
00058             }
00059             if (point < end)
00060                 return true;
00061             if (point > start)
00062                 return true;
00063             return false;
00064         }
00065 
00066         int32_t countCoversPoint(uint64_t point) {
00067             if (start < end) {
00068                 if ((point > start) && (point < end))
00069                     return rounds + 1;
00070                 return rounds;
00071             }
00072             if (point < end)
00073                 return rounds + 1;
00074             if (point > start)
00075                 return rounds + 1;
00076             return rounds;
00077         }
00078     private:
00079         int64_t id;
00080         uint64_t start;
